animeDescription: Ace pilot Trava and his personal mechanic buddy Shinkai, on their way to mark an out-of-the-way planet, pick up Mikuru, a girl with no memory. The three are about to discover that the planet is more than it seems.(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Koike, Takeshi', 'Co-Director'], ['Ishii, Katsuhito', 'Director'], ['Imaishi, Hiroyuki', 'Storyboard, Key Animation'], ['Yamamoto, Sayo', 'Storyboard, Assistant Animation Director, Assistant Director']]
